attributes.action: remove the HPV vaccination and spend more money on teaching children about safe sex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned declare that the government should spend more time and money on teaching children the consequences of not having safe sex which further down the line will benefit the nation more then some vaccination. Proper sexual education is the way forward not immunization of children who will not understand the consequences of unsafe sex by just having the jab.
